properties.name: captureBindParameters
properties.label: Bind parameters
properties.description: Capture jdbc bind parameters for PreparedStatement executions.

properties.name: captureResultSetNavigate
properties.label: ResultSet navigation
properties.description: Capture timings for executions of ResultSet.next()/previous()/relative()/etc to read the next record in a result set. This defaults to true since the timing for this timer is a good indication of jdbc fetch size issues and database latency, but it can be disabled if it is common to return millions of records and the overhead of System.nanoTime() becomes relevant.

properties.name: captureResultSetGet
properties.label: ResultSet values
properties.checkboxLabel: Capture timings for ResultSet value retrieval
properties.description: Capture timings for executions of ResultSet.get*() to read the individual column values out of a result set record. This defaults to false since the number of calls can be excessive and generally ResultSet.next() captures more interesting info with less overhead.

properties.name: captureGetConnection
properties.label: Get connection
properties.description: Capture timings for executions of DataSource.getConnection().

properties.name: captureConnectionClose
properties.label: Connection close
properties.description: Capture timings for executions of Connection.close().

properties.name: capturePreparedStatementCreation
properties.label: Prepared statement creation
properties.description: Capture timings for executions of Connection.prepareStatement() and Connection.prepareCall().

properties.name: captureStatementClose
properties.label: Statement close
properties.description: Capture timings for executions of Statement.close().

properties.name: captureTransactionLifecycleTraceEntries
properties.label: Transaction lifecycle
properties.description: Capture trace entries for executions of Connection.setAutoCommit()

properties.name: captureConnectionLifecycleTraceEntries
properties.label: Connection lifecycle
properties.checkboxLabel: Capture trace entries for Connection opening and closing
properties.description: Capture trace entries for executions of DataSource.getConnection() and Connection.close()

properties.name: stackTraceThresholdMillis
properties.label: Stack trace threshold (millis)
properties.description: Any jdbc call that exceeds this threshold will have a stack trace captured and attached to it. An empty value will not collect any stack traces, a zero value will collect a stack trace for every jdbc call.
